mapper.insert: insert into cas_user ( userid, user_group_id, user_lv_id, username, password, freeze, thirdid, salt, encrypt, tel, phone, verifiedPhone, email, verifiedEmail, nickname, realname, idcard, gender, avatar, device_type, device_no, channelid, status, is_verify, is_del, last_login_time, last_login_ip, ban_etime, ctime, mtime )values ( #{userid}, #{userGroupId}, #{userLvId}, #{username}, #{password}, #{freeze}, #{thirdid}, #{salt}, #{encrypt}, #{tel}, #{phone}, #{verifiedPhone}, #{email}, #{verifiedEmail}, #{nickname}, #{realname}, #{idcard}, #{gender}, #{avatar}, #{deviceType}, #{deviceNo}, #{channelid}, #{status}, #{isVerify}, #{isDel}, #{lastLoginTime}, #{lastLoginIp}, #{banEtime}, #{ctime}, #{mtime} )
mapper.update:
update cas_user
userid=#{userid},
user_group_id=#{userGroupId},
user_lv_id=#{userLvId},
username=#{username},
password=#{password},
freeze=#{freeze},
thirdid=#{thirdid},
salt=#{salt},
encrypt=#{encrypt},
tel=#{tel},
phone=#{phone},
verifiedPhone=#{verifiedPhone},
email=#{email},
verifiedEmail=#{verifiedEmail},
nickname=#{nickname},
realname=#{realname},
idcard=#{idcard},
gender=#{gender},
avatar=#{avatar},
device_type=#{deviceType},
device_no=#{deviceNo},
channelid=#{channelid},
status=#{status},
is_verify=#{isVerify},
is_del=#{isDel},
last_login_time=#{lastLoginTime},
last_login_ip=#{lastLoginIp},
ban_etime=#{banEtime},
ctime=#{ctime},
mtime=#{mtime},
userid=#{userid}
mapper.select: select userid, user_group_id, user_lv_id, username, password, freeze, thirdid, salt, encrypt, tel, phone, verifiedPhone, email, verifiedEmail, nickname, realname, idcard, gender, avatar, device_type, device_no, channelid, status, is_verify, is_del, last_login_time, last_login_ip, ban_etime, ctime, mtime from cas_user where userid=#{userid}

select userid, user_group_id, user_lv_id, username, password, freeze, thirdid, salt, encrypt, tel, phone, verifiedPhone, email, verifiedEmail, nickname, realname, idcard, gender, avatar, device_type, device_no, channelid, status, is_verify, is_del, last_login_time, last_login_ip, ban_etime, ctime, mtime from cas_user where userid=#{userid}

select userid, user_group_id, user_lv_id, username, password, freeze, thirdid, salt, encrypt, tel, phone, verifiedPhone, email, verifiedEmail, nickname, realname, idcard, gender, avatar, device_type, device_no, channelid, status, is_verify, is_del, last_login_time, last_login_ip, ban_etime, ctime, mtime
limit #{offset},#{rows}
